abstracts.cdata!:
The project would consist of: (a)
            construction, furnishing and equipment of approximately 150
            workshops for teaching practical subjects with about 6000
            student places; (b) construction, furnishing and equipping
            of a print shop and the provision of paper for the
            production and distribution of about 2.7 million textbooks
            and 1.6 million student guides; (c) construction and
            equipping of an office building for a School Financing and
            Construction Unit (SFCU); and (d) technical assistance for
            project implementation (44 man-years) and for evaluation of
            project financing mechanisms, construction methods and
            selection/examination procedures for secondary education (4 man-years).
